page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION.
page.content: { {There are five settlements in {this area.The largest is Burnopfield, {including Lintz and Crookgate Bank {Top.Pickering Nook,at the junction of {the A6077 and the A692 and Byermoor {further east along the A692 are the {next largest.Then there is the small {village of Tanfield and Clough Dene {which is a small collection of houses {on either side of the A6077. { There is only one small site given {over to industry and that is the {Industrial Estate at the Hobson near {Pickering Nook.The rest of the land {cover is either agricultural or {woodland. { The main industry in the past was {coal mining but the pits have now {closed in this area and the residents {are mainly commuters to Newcastle, {Gateshead,Sunderland or Durham. }
